ygData.subject: Re: OOC: Two years ago....
ygData.msgSnippet: Kyle wasn t being stupid faggot, and I don t find what he said disrespectful. He wasn t even wasn t even taking a shot at Airly. Correcting someone s english

Kyle wasn't being stupid faggot, and I don't find what he said 
disrespectful. He wasn't even wasn't even taking a shot at Airly. 
Correcting someone's english spelling/grammar is hardly an insult, 
and I have no clue how one could be considered an idiot for that. I 
help Airly with her grammar sometimes too, and that doesn't make me 
an idiot, so it obviously doesn't make Kyle one either.

Though "Long live the NBWRPG" is more correct than "Long life to 
NBWRPG", but both are acceptable in that we understand the ultimate 
idea being presented. Essentially, there's no point in arguing or 
petty name calling, so cut it out, and please don't do it again.
